title: Fonts with a Greek Feel?
content: I am looking for a font that has a Greek feel to it. Not actual Greek letters. I am making some photobooks of my trip to Greece. Thanks!
author: aiglazar

comments.content: Also check out [the new Nami family](http://web.archive.org/web/20090611090548/http:/www.linotype.com/3289-21656/namiusagesamples.html) from Frutiger and Kobayashi.
Some of these are great, but are there any that are free?
You are at the wrong site for second-rate free shiz. Try dafont.com.

What Stephen said. On the other hand Skia comes  
with MacOS, no? Or is that no longer the case?

hhp

At least a couple of weights of Lithos are bundled with some Adobe applications.

T

Looking at Kouros again, this is a stretch but just maybe:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/presencetypo/cassandre/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090611090548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/presencetypo/cassandre/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/presencetypo/cassandre/")

hhp
